summary: NASA is developing 3 systems to put astronauts into space—the Orion crew vehicle, Space Launch System, and Exploration Ground Systems. NASA will need these systems for its human space exploration goals, including sending astronauts to the moon as soon as 2024. We’ve been concerned about how NASA is managing these large and complex efforts. Past reports have noted that schedules were overly optimistic and that...
title: NASA: Actions Needed to Improve the Management of Human Spaceflight Programs
